data.name: KreatureKind
data.detailed_description:
KreatureKind is an approachable and wholesome Card Battler/Deck Builder game where you treat monsters with kindness.



In KreatureKind, the heroes have all found magic swords which enhance their inherent abilities. It just so happens that they are really good at hugging, listening, and sharing memes!

KreatureKind relies heavily on approachable card battle encounters, between which you build and upgrade your decks. There will also be a story-focused campaign, through which you get to know the main characters, and investigate why these folklore creatures are restless.

What to expect


  • Wholesome This game puts emphasis on non-violent, kind encounters. Listen to the grievances of the monsters you meet, and see if you can cheer them up!
  • Approachable The game is relatively forgiving, and while you can play it on a challenge difficulty too, even people who are new to games will be able to get through the campaign.
  • Card battler/Deck builder The core of the game centers around encounters, in which you choose which cards to play to cheer the monsters up. Between encounters, you can unlock new cards, upgrade them, adopt pets to get different perks, and so on.

data.short_description: A wholesome and approachable Card Battler/Deck Builder, where you are being kind to the monsters instead of killing them! Help a range of different cryptids and mythical creatures, and figure out how you can improve the situation for all monsters in the world.
